statements: SELECT * FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Tech' ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Companies WHERE established_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT company_id, company_name, industry, location FROM Companies;
SELECT * FROM Companies WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM Companies WHERE established_date < '2015-01-01' ORDER BY established_date ASC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM Companies WHERE established_date >= '2010-01-01' ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT * FROM Companies WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY established_date ASC;
SELECT company_id, company_name, location FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Technology' AND established_date >= '2015-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_companies FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM Companies WHERE industry LIKE '%Tech%' AND location IN ('San Francisco', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY established_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Companies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT company_name, job_title FROM Companies JOIN JobPostings ON Companies.company_id = JobPostings.company_id;
SELECT job_id, job_title, job_description FROM JobPostings WHERE job_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Companies INNER JOIN JobPostings ON Companies.company_id = JobPostings.company_id WHERE Companies.industry = 'IT'
SELECT company_name, job_title FROM Companies, JobPostings WHERE Companies.company_id = JobPostings.company_id AND Companies.industry = 'Finance'
SELECT j.job_title, c.company_name FROM JobPostings j JOIN Companies c ON j.company_id = c.company_id WHERE c.industry = 'Healthcare'
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM JobPostings WHERE job_description LIKE '%remote%'
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS job_count FROM Companies JOIN JobPostings ON Companies.company_id = JobPostings.company_id GROUP BY company_name HAVING job_count > 1
SELECT * FROM job_postings;
SELECT job_title, company_id FROM job_postings WHERE job_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, skills FROM candidate_resumes WHERE experience_years > 3;
SELECT * FROM interview_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT job_id, feedback FROM interview_feedback WHERE interviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM job_postings WHERE job_id = 1;
SELECT job_title, company_id FROM job_postings ORDER BY job_title ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, skills FROM candidate_resumes WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT feedback, interviewer_name FROM interview_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT job_title, job_description, company_id FROM job_postings JOIN interview_feedback ON job_postings.job_id = interview_feedback.job_id WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY job_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM companies;
SELECT company_name, hq_location FROM companies;
SELECT candidate_id, full_name, experience_years FROM candidate_resumes;
SELECT job_title, description, company_id FROM job_postings;
SELECT feedback_id, interviewer_id, feedback FROM interview_feedback;
SELECT * FROM job_postings
SELECT job_title, company_id FROM job_postings WHERE job_id = 5
SELECT full_name, experience_years FROM candidate_resumes ORDER BY experience_years DESC
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE hq_location = 'New York'
SELECT candidate_id, feedback FROM interview_feedback WHERE interviewer_id = 10
SELECT job_title, job_description, job_location FROM JobPostings;
SELECT * FROM CandidateResumes WHERE resume_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text FROM InterviewFeedback WHERE candidate_id = 2;
SELECT company_name, industry, location FROM Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM JobPostings WHERE company_id = 3 AND job_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM JobPostings WHERE job_location = 'New York';
SELECT posting_id, job_title, job_description FROM JobPostings WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_id, interviewer_name, feedback_text FROM InterviewFeedback WHERE posting_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM CandidateResumes WHERE resume_id = 2;
SELECT company_id, company_name, industry, location FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name DESC;
